VARDESC: Prior to the COVID-19 outbreak, did you have a medical condition that could cause you to get very sick if you were to get COVID-19? (e.g., asthma, a breathing or lung problem, suppressed immune system, diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or some other significant health problem)
If yes, what was that?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Prior to the COVID-19 outbreak, did you have a medical condition that could cause you to get very sick if you were to get COVID-19? (e.g., asthma, a breathing or lung problem, suppressed immune system, diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or some other significant health problem)' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: During or in the few months prior to the COVID-19 outbreak, were you a smoker or vaper? [check all that apply]
How much [do/did] you smoke?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'During or in the few months prior to the COVID-19 outbreak, were you a smoker or vaper?' = 'Yes, smoker'
VALUES: A pack or more a day (a pack is 20 cigarettes)
column21: Less than one cigarette per day

VARDESC: How often did you vape?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'During or in the few months prior to the COVID-19 outbreak, were you a smoker or vaper?' = 'Yes, vaper'

VARDESC: During or after the COVID-19 outbreak started, were you pregnant?

column19: Not sure, I think someone I lived with might have had COVID-19

VARDESC: Who was this? [check all that apply]
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'During the COVID-19 outbreak, did you ever live with someone that was sick with COVID19?' = 'Yes' or 'During the COVID-19 outbreak, did you ever live with someone that was sick with COVID19?' = 'Not sure, I think someone I lived with might have had COVID-19'
